                           d   p   O   n   E   r   r   o   r   O   v   e   r   r   i   d   e   .   s   k   i   p   T   r   a   c   e       =       1   ;   
                           w   i   n   d   o   w   .   o   n   e   r   r   o   r       =       d   p   O   n   E   r   r   o   r   O   v   e   r   r   i   d   e   ;   
                   }   )   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   o   n   e   r   r   o   r   )   ;   
   
   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   
   
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;

   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   h   ,   k   )   {   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       d   (   c   )   {   c   =   "   "   ;   v   a   r       b   =   a   .   i   s   B   F   T   ?    d   )   ,   a   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   k   e   y   u   p   "   ,   d   )   ,   e   &amp;&amp;4   !   =   b   &amp;&amp;5   !   =   b   |   |   (   a   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   f   o   c   u   s   "   ,   d   )   ,   a   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   b   l   u   r   "   ,   n   )   )   ,   e   &amp;&amp;a   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   a   .   p   a   g   e   V   i   z   .   e   v   e   n   t   ,   l   )   ,   !   e   |   |   3   !   =   b   &amp;&amp;5   !   =   b   |   |   l   (   {   }   )   )   ;   a   .   a   f   t   b   =   1   }   )   (   u   e   _   c   s   m   ,   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   ;   
   
   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   v   a   r       b   =   a   .   a   l   e   r   t   ;   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   l   e   r   t   =   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )   {   a   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   (   {   m   e   s   s   a   g   e   :   "   [   C   S   M   ]       A   l   e   r   t       i   n   v   o   c   a   t   i   o   n       d   e   t   e   c   t   e   d       w   i   t   h       a   r   g   u   m   e   n   t   :       "   +   a   r   g   u   m   e   n   t   s   [   0   ]   ,   l   o   g   L   e   v   e   l   :   "   W   A   R   N   "   }   )   ;   F   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   .   p   r   o   t   o   t   y   p   e   .   a   p   p   l   y   .   a   p   p   l   y   (   b   ,   [   a   ,   a   r   g   u   m   e   n   t   s   |   |   [   ]   ]   )   }   }   )   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   ;   
   
   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   d   ,   r   ,   k   )   {   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       l   (   a   )   {   i   f   (   !   b   )   i   f   (   b   =   e   [   a   .   t   y   p   e   ]   ,   "   u   n   d   e   f   i   n   e   d   "   =   =   =   t   y   p   e   o   f       a   .   c   l   i   e   n   t   X   ?   (   f   =   a   .   p   a   g   e   X   ,   g   =   a   .   p   a   g   e   Y   )   :   (   f   =   a   .   c   l   i   e   n   t   X   ,   g   =   a   .   c   l   i   e   n   t   Y   )   ,   2   !   =   b   |   |   h   &amp;&amp;(   h   !   =   f   |   |   m   !   =   g   )   )   {   f   o   r   (   v   a   r       d       i   n       e   )   e   .   h   a   s   O   w   n   P   r   o   p   e   r   t   y   (   d   )   &amp;&amp;c   .   d   e   t   a   c   h   (   d   ,   l   ,   k   )   ;   c   .   i   s   l   &amp;&amp;r   .   s   e   t   T   i   m   e   o   u   t   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )   {   n   (   "   a   t   "   ,   c   .   i   d   )   }   ,   0   )   }   e   l   s   e       h   =   f   ,   m   =   g   ,   b   =   0   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       s   (   )   {   v   a   r       a   =   "   "   ;   !   p   &amp;&amp;b   &amp;&amp;(   p   =   1   ,   a   +   =   "   &amp;u   i   =   "   +   b   )   ;   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   }   v   a   r       c   =   d   .   u   e   ,   n   =   d   .   u   e   x   ,   p   =   0   ,   b   =   0   ,   h   ,   m   ,   f   ,   g   ,   e   =   {   c   l   i   c   k   :   1   ,   m   o   u   s   e   m   o   v   e   :   2   ,   s   c   r   o   l   l   :   3   ,   k   e   y   d   o   w   n   :   4   }   ;   i   f   (   c   &amp;&amp;n   )   {   f   o   r   (   v   a   r       q       i   n       e   )   e   .   h   a   s   O   w   n   P   r   o   p   e   r   t   y   (   q   )   &amp;&amp;c   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   q   ,   l   ,   k   )   ;   c   .   _   u   i   =   s   }   }   )   (   u   e   _   c   s   m   ,   w   i   n   d   o   w   ,   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   ;   
   
   u   e   _   c   s   m   .   u   e   .   s   t   u   b   (   u   e   ,   "   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   "   )   ;   
   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

                   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   d   e   c   l   a   r   a   t   i   v   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   c   t   i   o   n   =   "   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   f   o   r   c   e   S   p   r   i   t   e   s   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   P   B   F   P   0   S   6   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   P   B   F   P   0   S   6   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   h   e   a   d   e   r   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   S   h   a   r   e       t   h   i   s       i   t   e   m       v   i   a       E   m   a   i   l   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   }   "   &gt;   
                                   a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   T   e   x   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   Z   g   A   O   v   b   1   A   1   S   1   Z   5   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   P   B   F   P   0   P   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   P   B   F   P   0   S   6   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   P   B   F   P   0   S   6   "   &gt;   S   h   a   r   e   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;                            a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   I   m   a   g   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   Z   g   A   O   v   b   1   A   1   S   1   Z   5   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;                    s   p   a   n       i   d   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   s   m   a   l   l       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   p   r   i   m   a   r   y       a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   c   o   n   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   n   e   r   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   c   a   r   t   "   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   i   n   p   u   t       i   d   =   "   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   A   d   d       t   o       S   h   o   p   p   i   n   g       C   a   r   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   h   o   v   e   r   =   "   S   e   l   e   c   t       &amp;l   t   ;   b   &amp;g   t   ;   _   _   d   i   m   s   _   _   &amp;l   t   ;   /   b   &amp;g   t   ;       f   r   o   m       t   h   e       l   e   f   t   &amp;l   t   ;   b   r   &amp;g   t   ;       t   o       a   d   d       t   o       S   h   o   p   p   i   n   g       C   a   r   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   i   n   p   u   t   "       t   y   p   e   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   "       v   a   l   u   e   =   "   A   d   d       t   o       C   a   r   t   "       a   r   i   a   -   l   a   b   e   l   l   e   d   b   y   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   a   n   n   o   u   n   c   e   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       i   d   =   "   s   u   b   m   i   t   .   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   c   a   r   t   -   a   n   n   o   u   n   c   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   -   t   e   x   t   "       a   r   i   a   -   h   i   d   d   e   n   =   "   t   r   u   e   "   &gt;                    l   i       i   d   =   "   n   o   F   l   a   s   h   C   o   n   t   e   n   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   o   F   l   a   s   h       a   -   h   i   d   d   e   n   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   s   t   -   i   t   e   m   "   &gt;

                                   "   m   a   x   S   w   a   t   c   h   e   s   F   o   r   I   m   m   e   r   s   i   v   e   V   i   e   w   "           :       [   0   ,   ]   ,   
                                   "   d   i   m   e   n   s   i   o   n   s   D   i   s   p   l   a   y   S   u   b   T   y   p   e   "           :       [   "   T   E   X   T   "   ,   ]   
                                   
                   }   ;   
                   r   e   t   u   r   n       d   a   t   a   T   o   R   e   t   u   r   n   ;   
   }   )   ;   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

                   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   i   z   e   -   b   a   s   e       a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   b   a   s   e   "   &gt;   !   -   -       M   s   g   I   d   :   c   f   s   _   f   r   e   e   _   s   h   i   p   p   i   n   g   _   q   u   a   l   i   f   y   _   i   n   l   i   n   e   :   w   e   b       -   -   &gt;   
   &amp;    b   &gt;   F   R   E   E       S   h   i   p   p   i   n   g   /   b   &gt;   .       a       h   r   e   f   =   '   /   g   p   /   h   e   l   p   /   c   u   s   t   o   m   e   r   /   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   m   k   _   s   s   s   _   d   p   _   1   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   o   p   -   u   p   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   n   o   d   e   I   d   =   5   2   7   6   9   2   '       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   '   A   m   a   z   o   n   H   e   l   p   '       o   n   c   l   i   c   k   =   "   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   m   z   _   j   s   _   P   o   p   W   i   n   (   t   h   i   s   .   h   r   e   f   ,   '   A   m   a   z   o   n   H   e   l   p   '   ,   '   w   i   d   t   h   =   5   5   0   ,   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   5   5   0   ,   r   e   s   i   z   a   b   l   e   =   1   ,   s   c   r   o   l   l   b   a   r   s   =   1   ,   t   o   o   l   b   a   r   =   0   ,   s   t   a   t   u   s   =   0   '   )   ;   "   &gt;   D   e   t   a   i   l   s   /   a   &gt;

                                   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   t   e   x   t   -   s   e   p   a   r   a   t   o   r       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   m   e   d   i   u   m   "   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   
                   
                   
                   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   i   z   e   -   b   a   s   e       a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   s   u   c   c   e   s   s   "   &gt;

{       i   f   (   !   f   e   t   c   h   e   d   I   t   e   m   s   [   i   ]   )       {       n   u   m   b   e   r   T   o   R   e   t   r   e   i   v   e   +   +   ;       }       }       p   .   p   r   e   f   e   t   c   h   _   n   e   x   t   _   p   a   g   e       =       f   a   l   s   e   ;       c   a   r   o   u   s   e   l   .   s   e   t   A   t   t   r   (   '   a   j   a    /   d   i   v   &gt;   
   d   i   v       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   c   l   e   a   r   :       l   e   f   t   ;   "   &gt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;
